content: Frontend Developer with 3 years of experience, I enjoy creating web products that are scalable and easy to use, leveraging industry best practices with a focus on micro-frontend and clean architecture. I have a solid grasp of TypeScript, React, Next.js, and State Management with Redux and React Query. I have also worked with React Native, and am proficient in using UI technologies like Figma, CSS frameworks such as Vanilla CSS, Tailwind, and Material UI.

My experience has allowed me to work with startups based in the United States on e-commerce projects and management platforms. Additionally, I have experience as a lecturer in Software Analysis and Development, which has enabled me to develop strong skills in problem-solving, assertive communication, and leading software projects.

JobList.title: Frontend Developer Lead
description: ✣ Lead the Frontend Development team in creating scalable and user-friendly products.
✣ Lead the development of the platform from scratch.
✣ Implement internationalization options for the web platform.

JobList.title: Software Developer Teacher
description: ✣ Assist my students in cultivating their logical reasoning and design abilities.
✣ Instruct my students in accordance with the guidelines set by the Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje (SENA).

JobList.title: React Frontend Developer
description: ✣ Develop components and functionalities aligned with Figma designs and Jira tickets.
✣ Work closely with the backend development team to guarantee the application satisfies client specifications.
✣ Attend client review meetings to confirm the application aligns with their expectations.

JobList.title: Software Developer Teacher
description: ✣ Instruct my students on designing components with Figma.
✣ Guide my students in creating layouts with HTML and CSS.
